_header: When Christs disciples their words heard
_description: Gospel for Wednesday following Nineteenth Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When cristes desciples þir wordes herdWith mekill ferly all þai ferd…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þus es oure godspell broght till endeGod wis vs till his welth at wende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Accesserunt ad ihesum discipuli eius.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Exposicio eiusdem fferia vi ante festum sancte trinitatis. fferia iiii secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 125va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.146-150.
